ayah: ٱقۡتَرَبَ لِلنَّاسِ حِسَابُهُمۡ وَهُمۡ فِي غَفۡلَةٖ مُّعۡرِضُونَ
ayah_translit: iq'taraba lilnnasi hisabuhum wahum fi ghaflatin mu'riduna
ayah_english: (Has) approached for [the] mankind their account while they (are) in heedlessness turning away

ayah: ٱقۡتَرَبَ لِلنَّاسِ حِسَابُهُمۡ وَهُمۡ فِي غَفۡلَةٖ مُّعۡرِضُونَ

ayah: مَا يَأۡتِيهِم مِّن ذِكۡرٖ مِّن رَّبِّهِم مُّحۡدَثٍ إِلَّا ٱسۡتَمَعُوهُ وَهُمۡ يَلۡعَبُونَ
ayah_translit: ma yatihim min dhik'rin min rabbihim muh'dathin illa is'tama'uhu wahum yal'abuna
ayah_english: Not comes to them of a Reminder from their Lord anew except they listen to it while they (are at) play

ayah: لَاهِيَةٗ قُلُوبُهُمۡۗ وَأَسَرُّواْ ٱلنَّجۡوَى ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ هَلۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا بَشَرٞ مِّثۡلُكُمۡۖ أَفَتَأۡتُونَ ٱلسِّحۡرَ وَأَنتُمۡ تُبۡصِرُونَ
ayah_translit: lahiyatan qulubuhum wa-asarru al-najwa alladhina zalamu hal hadha illa basharun mith'lukum afatatuna al-sih'ra wa-antum tub'siruna
ayah_english: Distracted their hearts And they conceal the private conversation those who [they] wronged Is this except a human being like you So would you approach the magic while you see (it)

ayah: لَاهِيَةٗ قُلُوبُهُمۡۗ وَأَسَرُّواْ ٱلنَّجۡوَى ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ هَلۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا بَشَرٞ مِّثۡلُكُمۡۖ أَفَتَأۡتُونَ ٱلسِّحۡرَ وَأَنتُمۡ تُبۡصِرُونَ

ayah: قَالَ رَبِّي يَعۡلَمُ ٱلۡقَوۡلَ فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ
ayah_translit: qala rabbi ya'lamu al-qawla fi al-samai wal-ardi wahuwa al-sami'u al-'alimu
ayah_english: He said My Lord knows the word in the heavens and the earth And He (is) the All-Hearer the All-Knower

ayah: قَالَ رَبِّي يَعۡلَمُ ٱلۡقَوۡلَ فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

ayah: بَلۡ قَالُوٓاْ أَضۡغَٰثُ أَحۡلَٰمِۭ بَلِ ٱفۡتَرَىٰهُ بَلۡ هُوَ شَاعِرٞ فَلۡيَأۡتِنَا بِـَٔايَةٖ كَمَآ أُرۡسِلَ ٱلۡأَوَّلُونَ
ayah_translit: bal qalu adghathu ahlamin bali if'tarahu bal huwa sha'irun falyatina biayatin kama ur'sila al-awaluna
ayah_english: Nay they say Muddled dreams nay he (has) invented it nay he (is) a poet So let him bring us a sign like what was sent (to) the former

ayah: مَآ ءَامَنَتۡ قَبۡلَهُم مِّن قَرۡيَةٍ أَهۡلَكۡنَٰهَآۖ أَفَهُمۡ يُؤۡمِنُونَ
ayah_translit: ma amanat qablahum min qaryatin ahlaknaha afahum yu'minuna
ayah_english: Not believed before them any town which We destroyed so will they believe

ayah: وَمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا قَبۡلَكَ إِلَّا رِجَالٗا نُّوحِيٓ إِلَيۡهِمۡۖ فَسۡـَٔلُوٓاْ أَهۡلَ ٱلذِّكۡرِ إِن كُنتُمۡ لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: wama arsalna qablaka illa rijalan nuhi ilayhim fasalu ahla al-dhik'ri in kuntum la ta'lamuna
ayah_english: And not We sent before you except men We revealed to them So ask (the) people (of) the Reminder if you (do) not know

ayah: وَمَا جَعَلۡنَٰهُمۡ جَسَدٗا لَّا يَأۡكُلُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ وَمَا كَانُواْ خَٰلِدِينَ
ayah_translit: wama ja'alnahum jasadan la yakuluna al-ta'ama wama kanu khalidina

ayah: ثُمَّ صَدَقۡنَٰهُمُ ٱلۡوَعۡدَ فَأَنجَيۡنَٰهُمۡ وَمَن نَّشَآءُ وَأَهۡلَكۡنَا ٱلۡمُسۡرِفِينَ
ayah_translit: thumma sadaqnahumu al-wa'da fa-anjaynahum waman nashau wa-ahlakna al-mus'rifina
ayah_english: Then We fulfilled (for) them the promise and We saved them and whom We willed and We destroyed the transgressors

ayah: لَقَدۡ أَنزَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡكُمۡ كِتَٰبٗا فِيهِ ذِكۡرُكُمۡۚ أَفَلَا تَعۡقِلُونَ
ayah_translit: laqad anzalna ilaykum kitaban fihi dhik'rukum afala ta'qiluna
ayah_english: Indeed We (have) sent down to you a Book in it (is) your mention Then will not you use reason

ayah: وَكَمۡ قَصَمۡنَا مِن قَرۡيَةٖ كَانَتۡ ظَالِمَةٗ وَأَنشَأۡنَا بَعۡدَهَا قَوۡمًا ءَاخَرِينَ
ayah_translit: wakam qasamna min qaryatin kanat zalimatan wa-anshana ba'daha qawman akharina
ayah_english: And how many We (have) shattered of a town (that) was unjust and We produced after them another people another people

ayah: فَلَمَّآ أَحَسُّواْ بَأۡسَنَآ إِذَا هُم مِّنۡهَا يَرۡكُضُونَ
ayah_translit: falamma ahassu basana idha hum min'ha yarkuduna
ayah_english: Then when they perceived Our torment behold they from it were fleeing

ayah: لَا تَرۡكُضُواْ وَٱرۡجِعُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ مَآ أُتۡرِفۡتُمۡ فِيهِ وَمَسَٰكِنِكُمۡ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُسۡـَٔلُونَ
ayah_translit: la tarkudu wa-ir'ji'u ila ma ut'rif'tum fihi wamasakinikum la'allakum tus'aluna
ayah_english: Flee not Flee not but return to what you were given luxury in it and to your homes so that you may be questioned

ayah: لَا تَرۡكُضُواْ وَٱرۡجِعُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ مَآ أُتۡرِفۡتُمۡ فِيهِ وَمَسَٰكِنِكُمۡ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُسۡـَٔلُونَ

ayah: قَالُواْ يَٰوَيۡلَنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا ظَٰلِمِينَ
ayah_translit: qalu yawaylana inna kunna zalimina
ayah_english: They said O woe to us! Indeed [we] we were wrongdoers

ayah: فَمَا زَالَت تِّلۡكَ دَعۡوَىٰهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ جَعَلۡنَٰهُمۡ حَصِيدًا خَٰمِدِينَ
ayah_translit: fama zalat til'ka da'wahum hatta ja'alnahum hasidan khamidina
ayah_english: Then not ceased [this] their cry until We made them reaped extinct

ayah: وَمَا خَلَقۡنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا لَٰعِبِينَ
ayah_translit: wama khalaqna al-samaa wal-arda wama baynahuma la'ibina
ayah_english: And not We created the heavens and the earth and what (is) between them (for) playing

ayah: لَوۡ أَرَدۡنَآ أَن نَّتَّخِذَ لَهۡوٗا لَّٱتَّخَذۡنَٰهُ مِن لَّدُنَّآ إِن كُنَّا فَٰعِلِينَ
ayah_translit: law aradna an nattakhidha lahwan la-ittakhadhnahu min ladunna in kunna fa'ilina
ayah_english: If We intended that We take a pastime surely We (could have) taken it from Us if We were doers

ayah: بَلۡ نَقۡذِفُ بِٱلۡحَقِّ عَلَى ٱلۡبَٰطِلِ فَيَدۡمَغُهُۥ فَإِذَا هُوَ زَاهِقٞۚ وَلَكُمُ ٱلۡوَيۡلُ مِمَّا تَصِفُونَ
ayah_translit: bal naqdhifu bil-haqi ala al-batili fayadmaghuhu fa-idha huwa zahiqun walakumu al-waylu mimma tasifuna
ayah_english: Nay We hurl the truth against [the] falsehood and it breaks its head behold it (is) vanishing And for you (is) destruction for what you ascribe

ayah_translit: bal naqdhifu bil-haqi ala al-batili fayadmaghuhu fa-idha huwa zahiqun walakumu al-waylu mimma tasifuna

ayah: وَلَهُۥ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَمَنۡ عِندَهُۥ لَا يَسۡتَكۡبِرُونَ عَنۡ عِبَادَتِهِۦ وَلَا يَسۡتَحۡسِرُونَ
ayah_translit: walahu man fi al-samawati wal-ardi waman indahu la yastakbiruna an ibadatihi wala yastahsiruna
ayah_english: And to Him (belongs) whoever (is) in the heavens and the earth And (those) who (are) near Him not they are arrogant to worship Him and not they tire

ayah: يُسَبِّحُونَ ٱلَّيۡلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَ لَا يَفۡتُرُونَ
ayah_translit: yusabbihuna al-layla wal-nahara la yafturuna
ayah_english: They glorify (Him) [the] night and [the] day not they slacken

ayah: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذُوٓاْ ءَالِهَةٗ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ هُمۡ يُنشِرُونَ
ayah_translit: ami ittakhadhu alihatan mina al-ardi hum yunshiruna
ayah_english: Or (have) they taken gods from the earth they raise (the dead)

ayah: لَوۡ كَانَ فِيهِمَآ ءَالِهَةٌ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ لَفَسَدَتَاۚ فَسُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
ayah_translit: law kana fihima alihatun illa al-lahu lafasadata fasub'hana al-lahi rabbi al-'arshi amma yasifuna
ayah_english: If (there) were in both of them gods besides Allah surely they (would) have been ruined So glorified (is) Allah Lord (of) the Throne (above) what they attribute

ayah: لَوۡ كَانَ فِيهِمَآ ءَالِهَةٌ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ لَفَسَدَتَاۚ فَسُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
ayah_translit: law kana fihima alihatun illa al-lahu lafasadata fasub'hana al-lahi rabbi al-'arshi amma yasifuna
ayah_english: If (there) were in both of them gods besides Allah surely they (would) have been ruined So glorified (is) Allah Lord (of) the Throne (above) what they attribute

ayah: لَوۡ كَانَ فِيهِمَآ ءَالِهَةٌ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ لَفَسَدَتَاۚ فَسُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ

ayah: لَا يُسۡـَٔلُ عَمَّا يَفۡعَلُ وَهُمۡ يُسۡـَٔلُونَ
ayah_translit: la yus'alu amma yaf 'alu wahum yus'aluna
ayah_english: Not He (can) be questioned about what He does but they will be questioned

ayah: لَا يُسۡـَٔلُ عَمَّا يَفۡعَلُ وَهُمۡ يُسۡـَٔلُونَ

ayah: لَا يُسۡـَٔلُ عَمَّا يَفۡعَلُ وَهُمۡ يُسۡـَٔلُونَ

ayah: لَا يُسۡـَٔلُ عَمَّا يَفۡعَلُ وَهُمۡ يُسۡـَٔلُونَ
ayah_translit: la yus'alu amma yaf 'alu wahum yus'aluna
ayah_english: Not He (can) be questioned about what He does but they will be questioned

ayah: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ ءَالِهَةٗۖ قُلۡ هَاتُواْ بُرۡهَٰنَكُمۡۖ هَٰذَا ذِكۡرُ مَن مَّعِيَ وَذِكۡرُ مَن قَبۡلِيۚ بَلۡ أَكۡثَرُهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ ٱلۡحَقَّۖ فَهُم مُّعۡرِضُونَ
ayah_translit: ami ittakhadhu min dunihi alihatan qul hatu bur'hanakum hadha dhik'ru man ma'iya wadhik'ru man qabli bal aktharuhum la ya'lamuna al-haqa fahum mu'riduna
ayah_english: Or (have) they taken besides Him besides Him gods Say Bring your proof This (is) a Reminder (for those) who (are) with me and a Reminder (for those) who (were) before me But most of them (do) not know the truth so they (are) averse

ayah_translit: ami ittakhadhu min dunihi alihatan qul hatu bur'hanakum hadha dhik'ru man ma'iya wadhik'ru man qabli bal aktharuhum la ya'lamuna al-haqa fahum mu'riduna

ayah: وَمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مِن قَبۡلِكَ مِن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا نُوحِيٓ إِلَيۡهِ أَنَّهُۥ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّآ أَنَا۠ فَٱعۡبُدُونِ
ayah_translit: wama arsalna min qablika min rasulin illa nuhi ilayhi annahu la ilaha illa ana fa-u'buduni
ayah_english: And not We sent before you before you any Messenger but We reveal(ed) to him that [He] (There is) no god except Me so worship Me

ayah: وَقَالُواْ ٱتَّخَذَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ وَلَدٗاۗ سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥۚ بَلۡ عِبَادٞ مُّكۡرَمُونَ
ayah_translit: waqalu ittakhadha al-rahmanu waladan sub'hanahu bal ibadun muk'ramuna
ayah_english: And they say Has taken the Most Gracious a son Glorified is He! Nay (they are) slaves honored

ayah: لَا يَسۡبِقُونَهُۥ بِٱلۡقَوۡلِ وَهُم بِأَمۡرِهِۦ يَعۡمَلُونَ
ayah_translit: la yasbiqunahu bil-qawli wahum bi-amrihi ya'maluna
ayah_english: Not they (can) precede Him in word and they by His command act

ayah: يَعۡلَمُ مَا بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَمَا خَلۡفَهُمۡ وَلَا يَشۡفَعُونَ إِلَّا لِمَنِ ٱرۡتَضَىٰ وَهُم مِّنۡ خَشۡيَتِهِۦ مُشۡفِقُونَ
ayah_translit: ya'lamu ma bayna aydihim wama khalfahum wala yashfa'una illa limani ir'tada wahum min khashyatihi mush'fiquna
ayah_english: He knows what (is) before them (is) before them and what (is) behind them and not they (can) intercede except for whom He approves And they from fear of Him stand in awe

ayah: يَعۡلَمُ مَا بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَمَا خَلۡفَهُمۡ وَلَا يَشۡفَعُونَ إِلَّا لِمَنِ ٱرۡتَضَىٰ وَهُم مِّنۡ خَشۡيَتِهِۦ مُشۡفِقُونَ

ayah_translit: ya'lamu ma bayna aydihim wama khalfahum wala yashfa'una illa limani ir'tada wahum min khashyatihi mush'fiquna
ayah_english: He knows what (is) before them (is) before them and what (is) behind them and not they (can) intercede except for whom He approves And they from fear of Him stand in awe

ayah: ۞وَمَن يَقُلۡ مِنۡهُمۡ إِنِّيٓ إِلَٰهٞ مِّن دُونِهِۦ فَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِيهِ جَهَنَّمَۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
ayah_translit: waman yaqul min'hum inni ilahun min dunihi fadhalika najzihi jahannama kadhalika najzi al-zalimina
ayah_english: And whoever says of them Indeed, I am a god besides Him besides Him Then that We will recompense (with) Hell Thus We recompense the wrongdoers

ayah_english: And whoever says of them Indeed, I am a god besides Him besides Him Then that We will recompense (with) Hell Thus We recompense the wrongdoers

ayah: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ كَانَتَا رَتۡقٗا فَفَتَقۡنَٰهُمَاۖ وَجَعَلۡنَا مِنَ ٱلۡمَآءِ كُلَّ شَيۡءٍ حَيٍّۚ أَفَلَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
ayah_translit: awalam yara alladhina kafaru anna al-samawati wal-arda kanata ratqan fafataqnahuma waja'alna mina al-mai kulla shayin hayyin afala yu'minuna
ayah_english: Do not see those who disbelieved that the heavens and the earth were a joined entity then We parted them and We made from [the] water every living thing living thing Then will not they believe

ayah: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ كَانَتَا رَتۡقٗا فَفَتَقۡنَٰهُمَاۖ وَجَعَلۡنَا مِنَ ٱلۡمَآءِ كُلَّ شَيۡءٍ حَيٍّۚ أَفَلَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

ayah: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ كَانَتَا رَتۡقٗا فَفَتَقۡنَٰهُمَاۖ وَجَعَلۡنَا مِنَ ٱلۡمَآءِ كُلَّ شَيۡءٍ حَيٍّۚ أَفَلَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

ayah_english: Do not see those who disbelieved that the heavens and the earth were a joined entity then We parted them and We made from [the] water every living thing living thing Then will not they believe

ayah: وَجَعَلۡنَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ رَوَٰسِيَ أَن تَمِيدَ بِهِمۡ وَجَعَلۡنَا فِيهَا فِجَاجٗا سُبُلٗا لَّعَلَّهُمۡ يَهۡتَدُونَ
ayah_translit: waja'alna fi al-ardi rawasiya an tamida bihim waja'alna fiha fijajan subulan la'allahum yahtaduna
ayah_english: And We (have) placed in the earth firmly set mountains lest it (should) shake with them and We made therein broad passes (as) ways so that they may (be) guided

ayah: وَجَعَلۡنَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ رَوَٰسِيَ أَن تَمِيدَ بِهِمۡ وَجَعَلۡنَا فِيهَا فِجَاجٗا سُبُلٗا لَّعَلَّهُمۡ يَهۡتَدُونَ

ayah: وَجَعَلۡنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ سَقۡفٗا مَّحۡفُوظٗاۖ وَهُمۡ عَنۡ ءَايَٰتِهَا مُعۡرِضُونَ
ayah_translit: waja'alna al-samaa saqfan mahfuzan wahum an ayatiha mu'riduna
ayah_english: And We made the sky a roof protected But they from its Signs turn away

ayah: وَجَعَلۡنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ سَقۡفٗا مَّحۡفُوظٗاۖ وَهُمۡ عَنۡ ءَايَٰتِهَا مُعۡرِضُونَ

ayah_english: And We made the sky a roof protected But they from its Signs turn away

ayah: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلَّيۡلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَ وَٱلشَّمۡسَ وَٱلۡقَمَرَۖ كُلّٞ فِي فَلَكٖ يَسۡبَحُونَ
ayah_translit: wahuwa alladhi khalaqa al-layla wal-nahara wal-shamsa wal-qamara kullun fi falakin yasbahuna
ayah_english: And He (is) the One Who created the night and the day and the sun and the moon each in an orbit floating

ayah: وَمَا جَعَلۡنَا لِبَشَرٖ مِّن قَبۡلِكَ ٱلۡخُلۡدَۖ أَفَإِيْن مِّتَّ فَهُمُ ٱلۡخَٰلِدُونَ
ayah_translit: wama ja'alna libasharin min qablika al-khul'da afa-in mitta fahumu al-khaliduna
ayah_english: And not We made for any man before you before you [the] immortality so if you die then (would) they live forever

ayah: كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ ذَآئِقَةُ ٱلۡمَوۡتِۗ وَنَبۡلُوكُم بِٱلشَّرِّ وَٱلۡخَيۡرِ فِتۡنَةٗۖ وَإِلَيۡنَا تُرۡجَعُونَ
ayah_translit: kullu nafsin dhaiqatu al-mawti wanablukum bil-shari wal-khayri fit'natan wa-ilayna tur'ja'una
ayah_english: Every soul (will) taste [the] death And We test you with [the] bad and [the] good (as) a trial and to Us you will be returned

ayah: وَإِذَا رَءَاكَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ إِن يَتَّخِذُونَكَ إِلَّا هُزُوًا أَهَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي يَذۡكُرُ ءَالِهَتَكُمۡ وَهُم بِذِكۡرِ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ هُمۡ كَٰفِرُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-idha raaka alladhina kafaru in yattakhidhunaka illa huzuwan ahadha alladhi yadhkuru alihatakum wahum bidhik'ri al-rahmani hum kafiruna
ayah_english: And when you see those who disbelieve not they take you except (in) ridicule Is this the one who mentions your gods And they at (the) mention (of) the Most Gracious [they] (are) disbelievers

ayah: وَإِذَا رَءَاكَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ إِن يَتَّخِذُونَكَ إِلَّا هُزُوًا أَهَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي يَذۡكُرُ ءَالِهَتَكُمۡ وَهُم بِذِكۡرِ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ هُمۡ كَٰفِرُونَ

ayah: وَإِذَا رَءَاكَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ إِن يَتَّخِذُونَكَ إِلَّا هُزُوًا أَهَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي يَذۡكُرُ ءَالِهَتَكُمۡ وَهُم بِذِكۡرِ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ هُمۡ كَٰفِرُونَ

ayah: خُلِقَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مِنۡ عَجَلٖۚ سَأُوْرِيكُمۡ ءَايَٰتِي فَلَا تَسۡتَعۡجِلُونِ
ayah_translit: khuliqa al-insanu min ajalin sa-urikum ayati fala tasta'jiluni
ayah_english: Is created the man of haste I will show you My Signs so (do) not ask Me to hasten

ayah: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلۡوَعۡدُ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ
ayah_translit: wayaquluna mata hadha al-wa'du in kuntum sadiqina
ayah_english: And they say When (will be fulfilled) this promise if you are truthful

ayah: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلۡوَعۡدُ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ

ayah: لَوۡ يَعۡلَمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ حِينَ لَا يَكُفُّونَ عَن وُجُوهِهِمُ ٱلنَّارَ وَلَا عَن ظُهُورِهِمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يُنصَرُونَ
ayah_translit: law ya'lamu alladhina kafaru hina la yakuffuna an wujuhihimu al-nara wala an zuhurihim wala hum yunsaruna
ayah_english: If knew those who disbelieved (the) time (when) not they will avert from their faces the Fire and not from their backs and not they will be helped!

ayah_translit: law ya'lamu alladhina kafaru hina la yakuffuna an wujuhihimu al-nara wala an zuhurihim wala hum yunsaruna
ayah_english: If knew those who disbelieved (the) time (when) not they will avert from their faces the Fire and not from their backs and not they will be helped!

ayah: بَلۡ تَأۡتِيهِم بَغۡتَةٗ فَتَبۡهَتُهُمۡ فَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ رَدَّهَا وَلَا هُمۡ يُنظَرُونَ
ayah_translit: bal tatihim baghtatan fatabhatuhum fala yastati'una raddaha wala hum yunzaruna
ayah_english: Nay it will come to them unexpectedly and bewilder them then not they will be able to repel it and not they will be given respite

ayah: وَلَقَدِ ٱسۡتُهۡزِئَ بِرُسُلٖ مِّن قَبۡلِكَ فَحَاقَ بِٱلَّذِينَ سَخِرُواْ مِنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ
ayah_translit: walaqadi us'tuh'zi-a birusulin min qablika fahaqa bi-alladhina sakhiru min'hum ma kanu bihi yastahziuna
ayah_english: And verily were mocked Messengers before you before you then surrounded those who mocked from them what they used at it (to) mock

ayah: وَلَقَدِ ٱسۡتُهۡزِئَ بِرُسُلٖ مِّن قَبۡلِكَ فَحَاقَ بِٱلَّذِينَ سَخِرُواْ مِنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ

ayah: قُلۡ مَن يَكۡلَؤُكُم بِٱلَّيۡلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ مِنَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ عَن ذِكۡرِ رَبِّهِم مُّعۡرِضُونَ
ayah_translit: qul man yakla-ukum bi-al-layli wal-nahari mina al-rahmani bal hum an dhik'ri rabbihim mu'riduna
ayah_english: Say Who (can) protect you in the night and the day from the Most Gracious Yet they from (the) remembrance (of) their Lord turn away

ayah: قُلۡ مَن يَكۡلَؤُكُم بِٱلَّيۡلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ مِنَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ عَن ذِكۡرِ رَبِّهِم مُّعۡرِضُونَ

ayah_translit: qul man yakla-ukum bi-al-layli wal-nahari mina al-rahmani bal hum an dhik'ri rabbihim mu'riduna
ayah_english: Say Who (can) protect you in the night and the day from the Most Gracious Yet they from (the) remembrance (of) their Lord turn away

ayah: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ ءَالِهَةٞ تَمۡنَعُهُم مِّن دُونِنَاۚ لَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ نَصۡرَ أَنفُسِهِمۡ وَلَا هُم مِّنَّا يُصۡحَبُونَ
ayah_translit: am lahum alihatun tamna'uhum min dunina la yastati'una nasra anfusihim wala hum minna yus'habuna
ayah_english: Or have they gods (to) defend them from Us Not they are able (to) help themselves and not they from Us can be protected

ayah: بَلۡ مَتَّعۡنَا هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ وَءَابَآءَهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ طَالَ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡعُمُرُۗ أَفَلَا يَرَوۡنَ أَنَّا نَأۡتِي ٱلۡأَرۡضَ نَنقُصُهَا مِنۡ أَطۡرَافِهَآۚ أَفَهُمُ ٱلۡغَٰلِبُونَ
ayah_translit: bal matta'na haulai waabaahum hatta tala alayhimu al-'umuru afala yarawna anna nati al-arda nanqusuha min atrafiha afahumu al-ghalibuna
ayah_english: Nay We gave provision (to) these and their fathers until grew long for them the life Then do not they see that We We come (to) the land We reduce it from its borders So is (it) they (who will be) overcoming

ayah: بَلۡ مَتَّعۡنَا هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ وَءَابَآءَهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ طَالَ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡعُمُرُۗ أَفَلَا يَرَوۡنَ أَنَّا نَأۡتِي ٱلۡأَرۡضَ نَنقُصُهَا مِنۡ أَطۡرَافِهَآۚ أَفَهُمُ ٱلۡغَٰلِبُونَ

ayah: بَلۡ مَتَّعۡنَا هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ وَءَابَآءَهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ طَالَ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡعُمُرُۗ أَفَلَا يَرَوۡنَ أَنَّا نَأۡتِي ٱلۡأَرۡضَ نَنقُصُهَا مِنۡ أَطۡرَافِهَآۚ أَفَهُمُ ٱلۡغَٰلِبُونَ

ayah: قُلۡ إِنَّمَآ أُنذِرُكُم بِٱلۡوَحۡيِۚ وَلَا يَسۡمَعُ ٱلصُّمُّ ٱلدُّعَآءَ إِذَا مَا يُنذَرُونَ
ayah_translit: qul innama undhirukum bil-wahyi wala yasma'u al-sumu al-du'aa idha ma yundharuna
ayah_english: Say Only I warn you by the revelation But not hear the deaf the call when when they are warned

ayah: قُلۡ إِنَّمَآ أُنذِرُكُم بِٱلۡوَحۡيِۚ وَلَا يَسۡمَعُ ٱلصُّمُّ ٱلدُّعَآءَ إِذَا مَا يُنذَرُونَ

ayah: وَلَئِن مَّسَّتۡهُمۡ نَفۡحَةٞ مِّنۡ عَذَابِ رَبِّكَ لَيَقُولُنَّ يَٰوَيۡلَنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا ظَٰلِمِينَ
ayah_translit: wala-in massathum nafhatun min adhabi rabbika layaqulunna yawaylana inna kunna zalimina
ayah_english: And if touches them a whiff of (the) punishment (of) your Lord surely they will say O woe to us! Indeed we [we] were wrongdoers

ayah: وَلَئِن مَّسَّتۡهُمۡ نَفۡحَةٞ مِّنۡ عَذَابِ رَبِّكَ لَيَقُولُنَّ يَٰوَيۡلَنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا ظَٰلِمِينَ

ayah: وَنَضَعُ ٱلۡمَوَٰزِينَ ٱلۡقِسۡطَ لِيَوۡمِ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ فَلَا تُظۡلَمُ نَفۡسٞ شَيۡـٔٗاۖ وَإِن كَانَ مِثۡقَالَ حَبَّةٖ مِّنۡ خَرۡدَلٍ أَتَيۡنَا بِهَاۗ وَكَفَىٰ بِنَا حَٰسِبِينَ
ayah_translit: wanada'u al-mawazina al-qis'ta liyawmi al-qiyamati fala tuz'lamu nafsun shayan wa-in kana mith'qala habbatin min khardalin atayna biha wakafa bina hasibina
ayah_english: And We set the scales (of) the justice for (the) Day (of) the Resurrection so not will be wronged any soul (in) anything And if (there) be weight (of) a seed of a mustard We will bring [with] it And sufficient (are) We (as) Reckoners

ayah: وَنَضَعُ ٱلۡمَوَٰزِينَ ٱلۡقِسۡطَ لِيَوۡمِ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ فَلَا تُظۡلَمُ نَفۡسٞ شَيۡـٔٗاۖ وَإِن كَانَ مِثۡقَالَ حَبَّةٖ مِّنۡ خَرۡدَلٍ أَتَيۡنَا بِهَاۗ وَكَفَىٰ بِنَا حَٰسِبِينَ

ayah_translit: wanada'u al-mawazina al-qis'ta liyawmi al-qiyamati fala tuz'lamu nafsun shayan wa-in kana mith'qala habbatin min khardalin atayna biha wakafa bina hasibina

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَىٰ وَهَٰرُونَ ٱلۡفُرۡقَانَ وَضِيَآءٗ وَذِكۡرٗا لِّلۡمُتَّقِينَ
ayah_translit: walaqad atayna musa waharuna al-fur'qana wadiyaan wadhik'ran lil'muttaqina
ayah_english: And verily We gave Musa and Harun the Criterion and a light and a Reminder for the righteous

ayah: ٱلَّذِينَ يَخۡشَوۡنَ رَبَّهُم بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَهُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّاعَةِ مُشۡفِقُونَ
ayah_translit: alladhina yakhshawna rabbahum bil-ghaybi wahum mina al-sa'ati mush'fiquna
ayah_english: Those who fear their Lord in the unseen and they of the Hour (are) afraid

ayah_english: Those who fear their Lord in the unseen and they of the Hour (are) afraid

ayah: ٱلَّذِينَ يَخۡشَوۡنَ رَبَّهُم بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَهُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّاعَةِ مُشۡفِقُونَ

ayah: وَهَٰذَا ذِكۡرٞ مُّبَارَكٌ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُۚ أَفَأَنتُمۡ لَهُۥ مُنكِرُونَ
ayah_translit: wahadha dhik'run mubarakun anzalnahu afa-antum lahu munkiruna
ayah_english: And this (is) a Reminder blessed which We (have) revealed Then are you of it rejecters

ayah: ۞وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَآ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ رُشۡدَهُۥ مِن قَبۡلُ وَكُنَّا بِهِۦ عَٰلِمِينَ
ayah_translit: walaqad atayna ib'rahima rush'dahu min qablu wakunna bihi alimina
ayah_english: And verily We gave Ibrahim his guidance before before and We were about him Well-Knowing

ayah: إِذۡ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوۡمِهِۦ مَا هَٰذِهِ ٱلتَّمَاثِيلُ ٱلَّتِيٓ أَنتُمۡ لَهَا عَٰكِفُونَ
ayah_translit: idh qala li-abihi waqawmihi ma hadhihi al-tamathilu allati antum laha akifuna
ayah_english: When he said to his father and his people What (are) these [the] statues which you to it (are) devoted

ayah: قَالُواْ وَجَدۡنَآ ءَابَآءَنَا لَهَا عَٰبِدِينَ
ayah_translit: qalu wajadna abaana laha abidina
ayah_english: They said We found our forefathers of them worshippers

ayah: قَالَ لَقَدۡ كُنتُمۡ أَنتُمۡ وَءَابَآؤُكُمۡ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ
ayah_translit: qala laqad kuntum antum waabaukum fi dalalin mubinin
ayah_english: He said Verily you are [you] and your forefathers (were) in an error manifest

ayah: قَالُوٓاْ أَجِئۡتَنَا بِٱلۡحَقِّ أَمۡ أَنتَ مِنَ ٱللَّـٰعِبِينَ
ayah_translit: qalu aji'tana bil-haqi am anta mina al-la'ibina
ayah_english: They said Have you come to us with the truth or you (are) of those who play

ayah: قَالَ بَل رَّبُّكُمۡ رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ ٱلَّذِي فَطَرَهُنَّ وَأَنَا۠ عَلَىٰ ذَٰلِكُم مِّنَ ٱلشَّـٰهِدِينَ
ayah_translit: qala bal rabbukum rabbu al-samawati wal-ardi alladhi fatarahunna wa-ana ala dhalikum mina al-shahidina
ayah_english: He said Nay your Lord (is the) Lord (of) the heavens and the earth the One Who created them and I am to that of the witnesses

ayah: وَتَٱللَّهِ لَأَكِيدَنَّ أَصۡنَٰمَكُم بَعۡدَ أَن تُوَلُّواْ مُدۡبِرِينَ
ayah_translit: watal-lahi la-akidanna asnamakum ba'da an tuwallu mud'birina
ayah_english: And by Allah surely I will plan (against) your idols after [that] you go away turning (your) backs

ayah: فَجَعَلَهُمۡ جُذَٰذًا إِلَّا كَبِيرٗا لَّهُمۡ لَعَلَّهُمۡ إِلَيۡهِ يَرۡجِعُونَ
ayah_translit: faja'alahum judhadhan illa kabiran lahum la'allahum ilayhi yarji'una
ayah_english: So he made them (into) pieces except a large (one) of them so that they may to it return

ayah: قَالُواْ مَن فَعَلَ هَٰذَا بِـَٔالِهَتِنَآ إِنَّهُۥ لَمِنَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
ayah_translit: qalu man fa'ala hadha bialihatina innahu lamina al-zalimina
ayah_english: They said Who (has) done this to our gods Indeed he (is) of the wrongdoers

ayah: قَالُواْ سَمِعۡنَا فَتٗى يَذۡكُرُهُمۡ يُقَالُ لَهُۥٓ إِبۡرَٰهِيمُ
ayah_translit: qalu sami'na fatan yadhkuruhum yuqalu lahu ib'rahimu
ayah_english: They said We heard a youth mention them he is called he is called Ibrahim

ayah: قَالُواْ فَأۡتُواْ بِهِۦ عَلَىٰٓ أَعۡيُنِ ٱلنَّاسِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَشۡهَدُونَ
ayah_translit: qalu fatu bihi ala a'yuni al-nasi la'allahum yashhaduna
ayah_english: They said Then bring him before (the) eyes (of) the people so that they may bear witness

ayah: قَالُوٓاْ ءَأَنتَ فَعَلۡتَ هَٰذَا بِـَٔالِهَتِنَا يَـٰٓإِبۡرَٰهِيمُ
ayah_translit: qalu a-anta fa'alta hadha bialihatina yaib'rahimu
ayah_english: They said Have you done this to our gods O Ibrahim

ayah: قَالَ بَلۡ فَعَلَهُۥ كَبِيرُهُمۡ هَٰذَا فَسۡـَٔلُوهُمۡ إِن كَانُواْ يَنطِقُونَ
ayah_translit: qala bal fa'alahu kabiruhum hadha fasaluhum in kanu yantiquna
ayah_english: He said Nay (some doer) did it Their chief (is) this So ask them if they (can) speak

ayah: فَرَجَعُوٓاْ إِلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمۡ فَقَالُوٓاْ إِنَّكُمۡ أَنتُمُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ
ayah_translit: faraja'u ila anfusihim faqalu innakum antumu al-zalimuna
ayah_english: So they returned to themselves and said Indeed you [you] (are) the wrongdoers

ayah_translit: thumma nukisu ala ruusihim laqad alim'ta ma haulai yantiquna
ayah_english: Then they were turned on their heads Verily you know not these (can) speak!

ayah: قَالَ أَفَتَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَنفَعُكُمۡ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا يَضُرُّكُمۡ
ayah_translit: qala afata'buduna min duni al-lahi ma la yanfa'ukum shayan wala yadurrukum
ayah_english: He said Then do you worship besides besides Allah what (does) not benefit you (in) anything and not harms you

ayah: أُفّٖ لَّكُمۡ وَلِمَا تَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِۚ أَفَلَا تَعۡقِلُونَ
ayah_translit: uffin lakum walima ta'buduna min duni al-lahi afala ta'qiluna
ayah_english: Uff to you and to what you worship besides besides Allah Then will not you use reason

ayah: أُفّٖ لَّكُمۡ وَلِمَا تَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِۚ أَفَلَا تَعۡقِلُونَ

ayah: قَالُواْ حَرِّقُوهُ وَٱنصُرُوٓاْ ءَالِهَتَكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ فَٰعِلِينَ
ayah_translit: qalu harriquhu wa-unsuru alihatakum in kuntum fa'ilina
ayah_english: They said Burn him and support your gods if you are doers

ayah: قُلۡنَا يَٰنَارُ كُونِي بَرۡدٗا وَسَلَٰمًا عَلَىٰٓ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ

ayah: وَأَرَادُواْ بِهِۦ كَيۡدٗا فَجَعَلۡنَٰهُمُ ٱلۡأَخۡسَرِينَ

ayah: وَنَجَّيۡنَٰهُ وَلُوطًا إِلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ ٱلَّتِي بَٰرَكۡنَا فِيهَا لِلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_translit: wanajjaynahu walutan ila al-ardi allati barakna fiha lil'alamina
ayah_english: And We delivered him and Lut to the land which We (had) blessed [in it] for the worlds

ayah: وَوَهَبۡنَا لَهُۥٓ إِسۡحَٰقَ وَيَعۡقُوبَ نَافِلَةٗۖ وَكُلّٗا جَعَلۡنَا صَٰلِحِينَ
ayah_translit: wawahabna lahu is'haqa waya'quba nafilatan wakullan ja'alna salihina
ayah_english: And We bestowed on him Ishaq and Yaqub (in) addition and all We made righteous

ayah: وَجَعَلۡنَٰهُمۡ أَئِمَّةٗ يَهۡدُونَ بِأَمۡرِنَا وَأَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَيۡهِمۡ فِعۡلَ ٱلۡخَيۡرَٰتِ وَإِقَامَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةِ وَإِيتَآءَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةِۖ وَكَانُواْ لَنَا عَٰبِدِينَ
ayah_translit: waja'alnahum a-immatan yahduna bi-amrina wa-awhayna ilayhim fi'la al-khayrati wa-iqama al-salati waitaa al-zakati wakanu lana abidina
ayah_english: And We made them leaders they guide by Our Command And We inspired to them (the) doing (of) good deeds and establishment (of) the prayer and giving (of) zakah and they were of Us worshippers

ayah: وَجَعَلۡنَٰهُمۡ أَئِمَّةٗ يَهۡدُونَ بِأَمۡرِنَا وَأَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَيۡهِمۡ فِعۡلَ ٱلۡخَيۡرَٰتِ وَإِقَامَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةِ وَإِيتَآءَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةِۖ وَكَانُواْ لَنَا عَٰبِدِينَ

ayah_english: And We made them leaders they guide by Our Command And We inspired to them (the) doing (of) good deeds and establishment (of) the prayer and giving (of) zakah and they were of Us worshippers

ayah: وَلُوطًا ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ حُكۡمٗا وَعِلۡمٗا وَنَجَّيۡنَٰهُ مِنَ ٱلۡقَرۡيَةِ ٱلَّتِي كَانَت تَّعۡمَلُ ٱلۡخَبَـٰٓئِثَۚ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ قَوۡمَ سَوۡءٖ فَٰسِقِينَ
ayah_translit: walutan ataynahu huk'man wa'il'man wanajjaynahu mina al-qaryati allati kanat ta'malu al-khabaitha innahum kanu qawma sawin fasiqina
ayah_english: And (to) Lut We gave him judgment and knowledge and We saved him from the town which was doing wicked deeds Indeed they were a people evil defiantly disobedient

ayah: وَلُوطًا ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ حُكۡمٗا وَعِلۡمٗا وَنَجَّيۡنَٰهُ مِنَ ٱلۡقَرۡيَةِ ٱلَّتِي كَانَت تَّعۡمَلُ ٱلۡخَبَـٰٓئِثَۚ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ قَوۡمَ سَوۡءٖ فَٰسِقِينَ

ayah_english: And We admitted him into Our Mercy Indeed he (was) of the righteous

ayah: وَنُوحًا إِذۡ نَادَىٰ مِن قَبۡلُ فَٱسۡتَجَبۡنَا لَهُۥ فَنَجَّيۡنَٰهُ وَأَهۡلَهُۥ مِنَ ٱلۡكَرۡبِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ
ayah_translit: wanuhan idh nada min qablu fa-is'tajabna lahu fanajjaynahu wa-ahlahu mina al-karbi al-'azimi
ayah_english: And Nuh when he called before before so We responded to him and We saved him and his family from the affliction [the] great

ayah: وَنَصَرۡنَٰهُ مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآۚ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ قَوۡمَ سَوۡءٖ فَأَغۡرَقۡنَٰهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ
ayah_translit: wanasarnahu mina al-qawmi alladhina kadhabu biayatina innahum kanu qawma sawin fa-aghraqnahum ajma'ina
ayah_english: And We helped him from the people who denied Our Signs Indeed they were a people evil so We drowned them all

ayah: وَنَصَرۡنَٰهُ مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآۚ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ قَوۡمَ سَوۡءٖ فَأَغۡرَقۡنَٰهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ

ayah_english: And We helped him from the people who denied Our Signs Indeed they were a people evil so We drowned them all

ayah: وَدَاوُۥدَ وَسُلَيۡمَٰنَ إِذۡ يَحۡكُمَانِ فِي ٱلۡحَرۡثِ إِذۡ نَفَشَتۡ فِيهِ غَنَمُ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ وَكُنَّا لِحُكۡمِهِمۡ شَٰهِدِينَ
ayah_translit: wadawuda wasulaymana idh yahkumani fi al-harthi idh nafashat fihi ghanamu al-qawmi wakunna lihuk'mihim shahidina
ayah_english: And Dawud and Sulaiman when they judged concerning the field when pastured in it sheep (of) a people and We were to their judgment witness

ayah: وَدَاوُۥدَ وَسُلَيۡمَٰنَ إِذۡ يَحۡكُمَانِ فِي ٱلۡحَرۡثِ إِذۡ نَفَشَتۡ فِيهِ غَنَمُ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ وَكُنَّا لِحُكۡمِهِمۡ شَٰهِدِينَ

ayah_translit: wadawuda wasulaymana idh yahkumani fi al-harthi idh nafashat fihi ghanamu al-qawmi wakunna lihuk'mihim shahidina
ayah_english: And Dawud and Sulaiman when they judged concerning the field when pastured in it sheep (of) a people and We were to their judgment witness

ayah: وَدَاوُۥدَ وَسُلَيۡمَٰنَ إِذۡ يَحۡكُمَانِ فِي ٱلۡحَرۡثِ إِذۡ نَفَشَتۡ فِيهِ غَنَمُ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ وَكُنَّا لِحُكۡمِهِمۡ شَٰهِدِينَ

ayah: فَفَهَّمۡنَٰهَا سُلَيۡمَٰنَۚ وَكُلًّا ءَاتَيۡنَا حُكۡمٗا وَعِلۡمٗاۚ وَسَخَّرۡنَا مَعَ دَاوُۥدَ ٱلۡجِبَالَ يُسَبِّحۡنَ وَٱلطَّيۡرَۚ وَكُنَّا فَٰعِلِينَ
ayah_translit: fafahhamnaha sulaymana wakullan atayna huk'man wa'il'man wasakharna ma'a dawuda al-jibala yusabbih'na wal-tayra wakunna fa'ilina
ayah_english: And We gave understanding of it (to) Sulaiman and (to) each We gave judgment and knowledge And We subjected with Dawud the mountains (to) glorify Our praises and the birds And We were the Doers
word_tranlation: And We gave understanding of it

ayah: فَفَهَّمۡنَٰهَا سُلَيۡمَٰنَۚ وَكُلًّا ءَاتَيۡنَا حُكۡمٗا وَعِلۡمٗاۚ وَسَخَّرۡنَا مَعَ دَاوُۥدَ ٱلۡجِبَالَ يُسَبِّحۡنَ وَٱلطَّيۡرَۚ وَكُنَّا فَٰعِلِينَ

ayah: وَعَلَّمۡنَٰهُ صَنۡعَةَ لَبُوسٖ لَّكُمۡ لِتُحۡصِنَكُم مِّنۢ بَأۡسِكُمۡۖ فَهَلۡ أَنتُمۡ شَٰكِرُونَ
ayah_translit: wa'allamnahu san'ata labusin lakum lituh'sinakum min basikum fahal antum shakiruna
ayah_english: And We taught him (the) making (of) coats of armor for you to protect you from your battle Then will you (be) grateful

ayah: وَلِسُلَيۡمَٰنَ ٱلرِّيحَ عَاصِفَةٗ تَجۡرِي بِأَمۡرِهِۦٓ إِلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ ٱلَّتِي بَٰرَكۡنَا فِيهَاۚ وَكُنَّا بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَٰلِمِينَ
ayah_translit: walisulaymana al-riha asifatan tajri bi-amrihi ila al-ardi allati barakna fiha wakunna bikulli shayin alimina
ayah_english: And to Sulaiman the wind forcefully blowing by his command to the land which We blessed [in it] And We are of every thing Knowers

ayah: وَلِسُلَيۡمَٰنَ ٱلرِّيحَ عَاصِفَةٗ تَجۡرِي بِأَمۡرِهِۦٓ إِلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ ٱلَّتِي بَٰرَكۡنَا فِيهَاۚ وَكُنَّا بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَٰلِمِينَ

ayah: وَلِسُلَيۡمَٰنَ ٱلرِّيحَ عَاصِفَةٗ تَجۡرِي بِأَمۡرِهِۦٓ إِلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ ٱلَّتِي بَٰرَكۡنَا فِيهَاۚ وَكُنَّا بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَٰلِمِينَ

ayah_english: And to Sulaiman the wind forcefully blowing by his command to the land which We blessed [in it] And We are of every thing Knowers

ayah: وَمِنَ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينِ مَن يَغُوصُونَ لَهُۥ وَيَعۡمَلُونَ عَمَلٗا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَۖ وَكُنَّا لَهُمۡ حَٰفِظِينَ
ayah_translit: wamina al-shayatini man yaghusuna lahu waya'maluna amalan duna dhalika wakunna lahum hafizina
ayah_english: And of the devils (were some) who would dive for him and would do work other than that And We were of them Guardians

ayah: وَمِنَ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينِ مَن يَغُوصُونَ لَهُۥ وَيَعۡمَلُونَ عَمَلٗا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَۖ وَكُنَّا لَهُمۡ حَٰفِظِينَ

ayah: ۞وَأَيُّوبَ إِذۡ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنِّي مَسَّنِيَ ٱلضُّرُّ وَأَنتَ أَرۡحَمُ ٱلرَّـٰحِمِينَ
ayah_translit: wa-ayyuba idh nada rabbahu anni massaniya al-duru wa-anta arhamu al-rahimina
ayah_english: And Ayub when he called (to) his Lord Indeed [I] has touched me the adversity and You (are) Most Merciful (of) the Merciful

ayah: ۞وَأَيُّوبَ إِذۡ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنِّي مَسَّنِيَ ٱلضُّرُّ وَأَنتَ أَرۡحَمُ ٱلرَّـٰحِمِينَ

ayah_translit: wa-ayyuba idh nada rabbahu anni massaniya al-duru wa-anta arhamu al-rahimina
ayah_english: And Ayub when he called (to) his Lord Indeed [I] has touched me the adversity and You (are) Most Merciful (of) the Merciful

ayah: فَٱسۡتَجَبۡنَا لَهُۥ فَكَشَفۡنَا مَا بِهِۦ مِن ضُرّٖۖ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ أَهۡلَهُۥ وَمِثۡلَهُم مَّعَهُمۡ رَحۡمَةٗ مِّنۡ عِندِنَا وَذِكۡرَىٰ لِلۡعَٰبِدِينَ
ayah_translit: fa-is'tajabna lahu fakashafna ma bihi min durrin waataynahu ahlahu wamith'lahum ma'ahum rahmatan min indina wadhik'ra lil'abidina
ayah_english: So We responded to him and We removed what (was) on him of (the) adversity And We gave him his family and (the) like thereof with them (as) Mercy from Ourselves from Ourselves and a reminder for the worshippers

ayah: فَٱسۡتَجَبۡنَا لَهُۥ فَكَشَفۡنَا مَا بِهِۦ مِن ضُرّٖۖ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ أَهۡلَهُۥ وَمِثۡلَهُم مَّعَهُمۡ رَحۡمَةٗ مِّنۡ عِندِنَا وَذِكۡرَىٰ لِلۡعَٰبِدِينَ

ayah_translit: wa-is'ma'ila wa-id'risa wadha al-kif'li kullun mina al-sabirina
ayah_english: And Ismail and Idris and Dhul-Kifl and Dhul-Kifl all (were) of the patient ones

ayah: وَذَا ٱلنُّونِ إِذ ذَّهَبَ مُغَٰضِبٗا فَظَنَّ أَن لَّن نَّقۡدِرَ عَلَيۡهِ فَنَادَىٰ فِي ٱلظُّلُمَٰتِ أَن لَّآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّآ أَنتَ سُبۡحَٰنَكَ إِنِّي كُنتُ مِنَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
ayah_translit: wadha al-nuni idh dhahaba mughadiban fazanna an lan naqdira alayhi fanada fi al-zulumati an la ilaha illa anta sub'hanaka inni kuntu mina al-zalimina
ayah_english: And Dhun-Nun And Dhun-Nun when he went (while) angry and thought that never We would decree upon him Then he called in the darkness(es) that (There is) no god except You Glory be to You Indeed, [I] I am of the wrongdoers

ayah: فَٱسۡتَجَبۡنَا لَهُۥ وَنَجَّيۡنَٰهُ مِنَ ٱلۡغَمِّۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُـۨجِي ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
ayah_translit: fa-is'tajabna lahu wanajjaynahu mina al-ghami wakadhalika nunji al-mu'minina
ayah_english: So We responded to him and We saved him from the distress And thus We save the believers

ayah: وَزَكَرِيَّآ إِذۡ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥ رَبِّ لَا تَذَرۡنِي فَرۡدٗا وَأَنتَ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡوَٰرِثِينَ
ayah_translit: wazakariyya idh nada rabbahu rabbi la tadharni fardan wa-anta khayru al-warithina
ayah_english: And Zakariya when he called (to) his Lord My Lord! (Do) not leave me alone while You (are) [the] Best (of) the inheritors

ayah: وَزَكَرِيَّآ إِذۡ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥ رَبِّ لَا تَذَرۡنِي فَرۡدٗا وَأَنتَ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡوَٰرِثِينَ
ayah_translit: wazakariyya idh nada rabbahu rabbi la tadharni fardan wa-anta khayru al-warithina
ayah_english: And Zakariya when he called (to) his Lord My Lord! (Do) not leave me alone while You (are) [the] Best (of) the inheritors

ayah: وَزَكَرِيَّآ إِذۡ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥ رَبِّ لَا تَذَرۡنِي فَرۡدٗا وَأَنتَ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡوَٰرِثِينَ

ayah_translit: wazakariyya idh nada rabbahu rabbi la tadharni fardan wa-anta khayru al-warithina
ayah_english: And Zakariya when he called (to) his Lord My Lord! (Do) not leave me alone while You (are) [the] Best (of) the inheritors

ayah: فَٱسۡتَجَبۡنَا لَهُۥ وَوَهَبۡنَا لَهُۥ يَحۡيَىٰ وَأَصۡلَحۡنَا لَهُۥ زَوۡجَهُۥٓۚ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ يُسَٰرِعُونَ فِي ٱلۡخَيۡرَٰتِ وَيَدۡعُونَنَا رَغَبٗا وَرَهَبٗاۖ وَكَانُواْ لَنَا خَٰشِعِينَ
ayah_translit: fa-is'tajabna lahu wawahabna lahu yahya wa-aslahna lahu zawjahu innahum kanu yusari'una fi al-khayrati wayad'unana raghaban warahaban wakanu lana khashi'ina
ayah_english: So We responded to him and We bestowed on him Yahya and We cured for him his wife Indeed they used (to) hasten in good deeds and they supplicate to Us (in) hope and fear and they were to Us humbly submissive

ayah: فَٱسۡتَجَبۡنَا لَهُۥ وَوَهَبۡنَا لَهُۥ يَحۡيَىٰ وَأَصۡلَحۡنَا لَهُۥ زَوۡجَهُۥٓۚ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ يُسَٰرِعُونَ فِي ٱلۡخَيۡرَٰتِ وَيَدۡعُونَنَا رَغَبٗا وَرَهَبٗاۖ وَكَانُواْ لَنَا خَٰشِعِينَ

ayah_translit: fa-is'tajabna lahu wawahabna lahu yahya wa-aslahna lahu zawjahu innahum kanu yusari'una fi al-khayrati wayad'unana raghaban warahaban wakanu lana khashi'ina

ayah: وَٱلَّتِيٓ أَحۡصَنَتۡ فَرۡجَهَا فَنَفَخۡنَا فِيهَا مِن رُّوحِنَا وَجَعَلۡنَٰهَا وَٱبۡنَهَآ ءَايَةٗ لِّلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_translit: wa-allati ahsanat farjaha fanafakhna fiha min ruhina waja'alnaha wa-ib'naha ayatan lil'alamina
ayah_english: And she who guarded her chastity so We breathed into her of Our Spirit and We made her and her son a sign for the worlds

ayah: إِنَّ هَٰذِهِۦٓ أُمَّتُكُمۡ أُمَّةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ وَأَنَا۠ رَبُّكُمۡ فَٱعۡبُدُونِ
ayah_translit: inna hadhihi ummatukum ummatan wahidatan wa-ana rabbukum fa-u'buduni
ayah_english: Indeed this (is) your religion religion one and I Am your Lord so worship Me

ayah: فَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ وَهُوَ مُؤۡمِنٞ فَلَا كُفۡرَانَ لِسَعۡيِهِۦ وَإِنَّا لَهُۥ كَٰتِبُونَ
ayah_translit: faman ya'mal mina al-salihati wahuwa mu'minun fala kuf'rana lisa'yihi wa-inna lahu katibuna
ayah_english: Then whoever does [of] [the] righteous deeds while he (is) a believer then not (will be) rejected [of] his effort And indeed We of it (are) Recorders

ayah: وَحَرَٰمٌ عَلَىٰ قَرۡيَةٍ أَهۡلَكۡنَٰهَآ أَنَّهُمۡ لَا يَرۡجِعُونَ
ayah_translit: waharamun ala qaryatin ahlaknaha annahum la yarji'una
ayah_english: And (there is) prohibition upon a city which We have destroyed that they not will return

ayah: وَحَرَٰمٌ عَلَىٰ قَرۡيَةٍ أَهۡلَكۡنَٰهَآ أَنَّهُمۡ لَا يَرۡجِعُونَ
ayah_translit: waharamun ala qaryatin ahlaknaha annahum la yarji'una

ayah: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا فُتِحَتۡ يَأۡجُوجُ وَمَأۡجُوجُ وَهُم مِّن كُلِّ حَدَبٖ يَنسِلُونَ
ayah_translit: hatta idha futihat yajuju wamajuju wahum min kulli hadabin yansiluna
ayah_english: Until when has been opened (for) the Yajuj and Majuj and they from every elevation descend

ayah: وَٱقۡتَرَبَ ٱلۡوَعۡدُ ٱلۡحَقُّ فَإِذَا هِيَ شَٰخِصَةٌ أَبۡصَٰرُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ يَٰوَيۡلَنَا قَدۡ كُنَّا فِي غَفۡلَةٖ مِّنۡ هَٰذَا بَلۡ كُنَّا ظَٰلِمِينَ
ayah_translit: wa-iq'taraba al-wa'du al-haqu fa-idha hiya shakhisatun absaru alladhina kafaru yawaylana qad kunna fi ghaflatin min hadha bal kunna zalimina
ayah_english: And has approached the promise [the] true then behold [it] (are) staring (the) eyes (of) those who disbelieved O woe to us! Verily we had been in heedlessness of this nay we were wrongdoers

ayah: وَٱقۡتَرَبَ ٱلۡوَعۡدُ ٱلۡحَقُّ فَإِذَا هِيَ شَٰخِصَةٌ أَبۡصَٰرُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ يَٰوَيۡلَنَا قَدۡ كُنَّا فِي غَفۡلَةٖ مِّنۡ هَٰذَا بَلۡ كُنَّا ظَٰلِمِينَ

ayah: وَٱقۡتَرَبَ ٱلۡوَعۡدُ ٱلۡحَقُّ فَإِذَا هِيَ شَٰخِصَةٌ أَبۡصَٰرُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ يَٰوَيۡلَنَا قَدۡ كُنَّا فِي غَفۡلَةٖ مِّنۡ هَٰذَا بَلۡ كُنَّا ظَٰلِمِينَ
ayah_translit: wa-iq'taraba al-wa'du al-haqu fa-idha hiya shakhisatun absaru alladhina kafaru yawaylana qad kunna fi ghaflatin min hadha bal kunna zalimina
ayah_english: And has approached the promise [the] true then behold [it] (are) staring (the) eyes (of) those who disbelieved O woe to us! Verily we had been in heedlessness of this nay we were wrongdoers

ayah: إِنَّكُمۡ وَمَا تَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ حَصَبُ جَهَنَّمَ أَنتُمۡ لَهَا وَٰرِدُونَ
ayah_translit: innakum wama ta'buduna min duni al-lahi hasabu jahannama antum laha wariduna
ayah_english: Indeed, you and what you worship besides Allah besides Allah besides Allah (are) firewood (of) Hell You to it will come

ayah: لَوۡ كَانَ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ ءَالِهَةٗ مَّا وَرَدُوهَاۖ وَكُلّٞ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ
ayah_translit: law kana haulai alihatan ma waraduha wakullun fiha khaliduna
ayah_english: If were these gods not they (would) have come to it And all therein will abide forever

ayah: لَهُمۡ فِيهَا زَفِيرٞ وَهُمۡ فِيهَا لَا يَسۡمَعُونَ
ayah_translit: lahum fiha zafirun wahum fiha la yasma'una
ayah_english: For them therein (is) sighing and they therein not will hear

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ سَبَقَتۡ لَهُم مِّنَّا ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰٓ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ عَنۡهَا مُبۡعَدُونَ
ayah_translit: inna alladhina sabaqat lahum minna al-hus'na ulaika anha mub'aduna
ayah_english: Indeed those has gone forth for them from Us the good those from it (will be) removed far

ayah: لَا يَسۡمَعُونَ حَسِيسَهَاۖ وَهُمۡ فِي مَا ٱشۡتَهَتۡ أَنفُسُهُمۡ خَٰلِدُونَ
ayah_translit: la yasma'una hasisaha wahum fi ma ish'tahat anfusuhum khaliduna
ayah_english: Not they will hear (the) slightest sound of it and they in what desire their souls will abide forever

ayah: لَا يَحۡزُنُهُمُ ٱلۡفَزَعُ ٱلۡأَكۡبَرُ وَتَتَلَقَّىٰهُمُ ٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ هَٰذَا يَوۡمُكُمُ ٱلَّذِي كُنتُمۡ تُوعَدُونَ
ayah_translit: la yahzunuhumu al-faza'u al-akbaru watatalaqqahumu al-malaikatu hadha yawmukumu alladhi kuntum tu'aduna
ayah_english: Not will grieve them the terror [the] greatest and will meet them the Angels This (is) your Day which you were promised

ayah: لَا يَحۡزُنُهُمُ ٱلۡفَزَعُ ٱلۡأَكۡبَرُ وَتَتَلَقَّىٰهُمُ ٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ هَٰذَا يَوۡمُكُمُ ٱلَّذِي كُنتُمۡ تُوعَدُونَ

ayah_english: Not will grieve them the terror [the] greatest and will meet them the Angels This (is) your Day which you were promised

ayah: يَوۡمَ نَطۡوِي ٱلسَّمَآءَ كَطَيِّ ٱلسِّجِلِّ لِلۡكُتُبِۚ كَمَا بَدَأۡنَآ أَوَّلَ خَلۡقٖ نُّعِيدُهُۥۚ وَعۡدًا عَلَيۡنَآۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا فَٰعِلِينَ
ayah_translit: yawma natwi al-samaa katayyi al-sijili lil'kutubi kama badana awwala khalqin nu'iduhu wa'dan alayna inna kunna fa'ilina
ayah_english: (The) Day We will fold the heaven like (the) folding (of) a scroll for records As We began (the) first creation We will repeat it a promise upon Us Indeed We We are (the) Doers

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ كَتَبۡنَا فِي ٱلزَّبُورِ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ٱلذِّكۡرِ أَنَّ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ يَرِثُهَا عِبَادِيَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحُونَ
ayah_translit: walaqad katabna fi al-zaburi min ba'di al-dhik'ri anna al-arda yarithuha ibadiya al-salihuna
ayah_english: And verily We have written in the Scripture after after the mention that the earth will inherit it My slaves the righteous

ayah_translit: walaqad katabna fi al-zaburi min ba'di al-dhik'ri anna al-arda yarithuha ibadiya al-salihuna

ayah_translit: inna fi hadha labalaghan liqawmin abidina

ayah_translit: wama arsalnaka illa rahmatan lil'alamina
ayah_english: And not We have sent you but (as) a mercy for the worlds

ayah: قُلۡ إِنَّمَا يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيَّ أَنَّمَآ إِلَٰهُكُمۡ إِلَٰهٞ وَٰحِدٞۖ فَهَلۡ أَنتُم مُّسۡلِمُونَ
ayah_translit: qul innama yuha ilayya annama ilahukum ilahun wahidun fahal antum mus'limuna
ayah_english: Say Only it is revealed to me that your god (is) God One so will you submit (to Him)

ayah: قُلۡ إِنَّمَا يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيَّ أَنَّمَآ إِلَٰهُكُمۡ إِلَٰهٞ وَٰحِدٞۖ فَهَلۡ أَنتُم مُّسۡلِمُونَ

ayah: فَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَقُلۡ ءَاذَنتُكُمۡ عَلَىٰ سَوَآءٖۖ وَإِنۡ أَدۡرِيٓ أَقَرِيبٌ أَم بَعِيدٞ مَّا تُوعَدُونَ
ayah_translit: fa-in tawallaw faqul adhantukum ala sawain wa-in adri aqaribun am ba'idun ma tu'aduna
ayah_english: But if they turn away then say I (have) announced to you equally equally And not I know whether is near or far what you are promised

ayah: إِنَّهُۥ يَعۡلَمُ ٱلۡجَهۡرَ مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡلِ وَيَعۡلَمُ مَا تَكۡتُمُونَ
ayah_translit: innahu ya'lamu al-jahra mina al-qawli waya'lamu ma taktumuna
ayah_english: Indeed He knows the declared [of] [the] speech and He knows what you conceal

ayah: إِنَّهُۥ يَعۡلَمُ ٱلۡجَهۡرَ مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡلِ وَيَعۡلَمُ مَا تَكۡتُمُونَ
ayah_translit: innahu ya'lamu al-jahra mina al-qawli waya'lamu ma taktumuna
ayah_english: Indeed He knows the declared [of] [the] speech and He knows what you conceal

ayah: إِنَّهُۥ يَعۡلَمُ ٱلۡجَهۡرَ مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡلِ وَيَعۡلَمُ مَا تَكۡتُمُونَ

ayah: إِنَّهُۥ يَعۡلَمُ ٱلۡجَهۡرَ مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡلِ وَيَعۡلَمُ مَا تَكۡتُمُونَ

ayah: وَإِنۡ أَدۡرِي لَعَلَّهُۥ فِتۡنَةٞ لَّكُمۡ وَمَتَٰعٌ إِلَىٰ حِينٖ
ayah_translit: wa-in adri la'allahu fit'natun lakum wamata'un ila hinin
ayah_english: And not I know perhaps it may be a trial for you and an enjoyment for a time

ayah: قَٰلَ رَبِّ ٱحۡكُم بِٱلۡحَقِّۗ وَرَبُّنَا ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ ٱلۡمُسۡتَعَانُ عَلَىٰ مَا تَصِفُونَ
ayah_translit: qala rabbi uh'kum bil-haqi warabbuna al-rahmanu al-mus'ta'anu ala ma tasifuna
ayah_english: He said My Lord! judge in truth And our Lord (is) the Most Gracious the One Whose help is sought against what you attribute

ayah: قَٰلَ رَبِّ ٱحۡكُم بِٱلۡحَقِّۗ وَرَبُّنَا ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ ٱلۡمُسۡتَعَانُ عَلَىٰ مَا تَصِفُونَ
